title: New: Nightlives – Give Nothing
content:
Despite this only being their second track, Toronto duo Nightlives have already begun making inroads into the blogosphere.

Debut track Underneath played upon their shoegaze influences, yet with the slick production skills that we’ve come to expect from the likes of The Neighbourhood and Rhye, whereas new cut Give Nothing peels off the shiny coating and returns the songwriting to it’s grittier roots. With a booming chorus and jagged guitar lines, Give Nothing is further reason to get excited about A Wink in the Face of Death, the debut LP from Nightlives.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
